import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import api from '../services/api'; const AuthorityLoginPage = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const { data } = await api.post('/authorities/login', { username, password }); localStorage.setItem('authorityToken', data.token); navigate('/dashboard'); } catch (err) { setError('Invalid credentials'); } }; return (
{/* Header with Logo */}
navigate('/')} className="flex items-center gap-4 cursor-pointer">
EcoCollect
Smart Waste Management
navigate('/')} className="hover:text-emerald-600 transition cursor-pointer">Home For Authorities
{/* Removed operator login button for cleaner authority login page */}
{/* Main Login Content */}
{/* Left Side - Welcome Content */}

Welcome back, Manager

Access your authority dashboard to monitor waste collection across your jurisdiction, view analytics, and manage collection operations efficiently.

Real-time Analytics
Monitor collection efficiency and waste patterns
Route Management
Optimize collection routes and schedules
Resident Management
Oversee resident accounts and service requests
{/* Right Side - Login Form */}

Authority Login

Sign in to access your authority dashboard

setUsername(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-emerald-500 transition bg-white" placeholder="Enter your username" required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-emerald-500 transition bg-white" placeholder="Enter your password" required />

); }; export default AuthorityLoginPage;
